name: BeautyPlus
description: BeautyPlus is a free AI-powered photo and video editing platform offering creative tools for selfies, aesthetic filters, and professional-quality enhancements.
longDescription: BeautyPlus is an AI-driven photo and video editing platform designed to help users create stunning visuals with ease, available on iOS, Android, and as a browser-based tool. Its mission is to empower users to enhance their selfies, photos, and videos with professional-quality results using intuitive AI tools. The platform caters to a wide audience, from casual users to social media enthusiasts, offering features like AI filters, makeup applicators, and background removal to transform images creatively. By leveraging advanced AI algorithms, BeautyPlus simplifies complex editing tasks, making them accessible without requiring technical expertise. It supports a global user base of over 800 million, emphasizing creativity and self-expression through its versatile editing capabilities.
features: AI Auto-Beautification enhances selfies instantly with smooth skin, bright smiles, and refined facial features for a polished look.
AI filters like Anime, Pixel, and Cartoon transform photos into artistic styles, adding creative flair to images.
Background removal and replacement tools allow users to erase or change photo backgrounds seamlessly for professional results.
Makeup applicator enables virtual try-ons of lipstick, eyeshadow, and blush, enhancing selfies with customizable beauty effects.
Photo booth feature captures Life4Cuts-style photo strips with filters and stickers, perfect for aesthetic social media posts.
Image upscaler improves low-resolution photos to HD quality, enhancing clarity and detail for professional use.
Collage maker combines multiple photos into artistic layouts, ideal for storytelling on social media.
Object remover uses AI to eliminate unwanted elements from photos, ensuring clean and focused visuals.
Video enhancer improves brightness, sharpness, and clarity of videos, suitable for professional and social media content.
Face shape analysis provides personalized hairstyle and makeup recommendations for tailored styling.
Vintage camera filters add retro effects to photos, creating a nostalgic aesthetic for users.
Night camera mode brightens low-light selfies, capturing natural beauty in challenging lighting conditions.

faqs.question: Is BeautyPlus free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, BeautyPlus offers a free plan with core editing features, though premium features like exclusive filters and ad-free experience require a subscription.

faqs.question: What devices are supported by BeautyPlus?
faqs.answer: BeautyPlus supports most devices with a camera, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and computers, ensuring a seamless experience across platforms.

faqs.question: Can I edit videos with BeautyPlus?
faqs.answer: Yes, BeautyPlus provides video editing tools to enhance brightness, sharpness, and remove backgrounds, creating professional-quality videos.

faqs.question: Does BeautyPlus offer AI-powered features?
faqs.answer: Yes, BeautyPlus uses advanced AI algorithms for auto-beautification, object removal, background editing, and creative filters like Anime and Pixel.

faqs.question: How do I use the online photo booth feature?
faqs.answer: Select a filter, click 'Start,' pose for four photos within a 3-second timer, then customize with frames and stickers before downloading.

faqs.question: Can I share my edited photos directly from BeautyPlus?
faqs.answer: Yes, BeautyPlus allows direct sharing to social media platforms like Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and Snapchat.

faqs.question: Does BeautyPlus support batch photo editing?
faqs.answer: Yes, BeautyPlus supports batch editing for up to 50 images, making it efficient for users with multiple photos.

faqs.question: What file formats does BeautyPlus support?
faqs.answer: BeautyPlus supports JPG, JPEG, and PNG formats for photos, with a maximum resolution of 4096x4096 and file size of 20MB.

faqs.question: How do I contact BeautyPlus support for issues?
faqs.answer: You can reach BeautyPlus support at support@beautyplus.com or visit their Help Center at http://support.beautyplus.com.
